divs: Sighting DetailsI have been seeing ufos almost every night for the past couple of days
Summary: As I began to get out of my car to take pictures, it began to ascend into the air and fly off slowly, it was also pointing the middle of its reddish/orange light in the middle of the triangular ship at me as if it was observing me
